# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

Returns the color used in the background of the thumbnail view.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The color of the background in the thumbnail view.

## Working with Thumbnail View Display Characteristics

- **maximumNumberOfColumns**: Returns the maximum number of columns of thumbnails the thumbnail view can display.
- **labelFont**: Returns the font used to label the thumbnails.
